message: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 ambiguous column name: meta_key.
details:
[03-Jun-2025 05:03:49 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

select p.ID as post_id, p.post_title as title, p.post_content as description, m1.meta_value as sku, m2.meta_value as sales_price, m3.meta_value as avex_price, m4.meta_value as stock, m5.meta_value as brand, m6.meta_value as ean, m7.meta_value as weight, m8.meta_value as images, m9.meta_value as image, m10.meta_value as category from wp_posts p inner join wp_postmeta m on m.post_id=p.ID and meta_key='_avex_imported_product' and meta_value=1 left join wp_postmeta m1 on m1.post_id=p.ID and m1.meta_key='_sku' left join wp_postmeta m2 on m2.post_id=p.ID and m2.meta_key='_avex_sales_price' left join wp_postmeta m3 on m3.post_id=p.ID and m3.meta_key='_avex_avex_price' left join wp_postmeta m4 on m4.post_id=p.ID and m4.meta_key='_stock' left join wp_postmeta m5 on m5.post_id=p.ID and m5.meta_key='_avex_brand' left join wp_postmeta m6 on m6.post_id=p.ID and m6.meta_key='_avex_ean' left join wp_postmeta m7 on m7.post_id=p.ID and m7.meta_key='_weight' left join wp_postmeta m8 on m8.post_id=p.ID and m8.meta_key='_avex_images' left join wp_postmeta m9 on m9.post_id=p.ID and m9.meta_key='_avex_image' left join wp_postmeta m10 on m10.post_id=p.ID and m10.meta_key='_avex_category' where p.post_type='product'

Queries made or created this session were:
